data.name: On-Campus Medical Facility
data.description: Velammal Engineering College provides a full-time medical facility with a qualified doctor and nurse available to attend to any health emergencies. The medical center is equipped with basic necessary equipment, and an ambulance service is on standby to handle emergencies and ensure the well-being of students and staff.

data.name: Reprographic Facility
data.description: The college has reprographic facility available for students which functions from 8:30 AM to 6:00 PM. It is located opposite to BILL GATES BLOCK in the Velammal Engineering College.

data.name: Store
data.description: A well-stocked store providing essential academic supplies, stationery, and other student requirements.

data.name: Sewage Treatment Plant
data.description: The Sewage Treatment Plant is designed for a capacity of 2,00,000 LITRES/DAY. The plant operates 24x7 with regular maintenance, utilizing a three-stage treatment process: Primary Treatment: Bar screening and sedimentation in a Primary Clarifier. Secondary Treatment: Activated Sludge Process. Tertiary Treatment: Sand & Activated Carbon Filters for final polishing. The plant includes sludge drying beds and treated water storage.

data.name: RO (Reverse Osmosis)
data.description: The RO plant in the campus is designed for a Capacity of 5000L/hr. The treated water is pumped using the Pneumatic pumping system and distributed for drinking purpose in the campus. Regular maintenance of the plant is done and water tested to confirm that the quality meets BIS ( IS 10500:2012) standards.

data.name: Solar Power
data.description: Velammal Educational Trust established a 10 MW Solar P.N power plant at Manjalkudi Village, commissioned on 19.03.2019, in alignment with central and state renewable energy policies.
